title: 1993 US Open – Women's singles
text:
<a href="Steffi%20Graf">Steffi Graf</a> defeated <a href="Helena%20Sukov%C3%A1">Helena Suková</a> in the final, 6–3, 6–3 to win the women's singles tennis title at the 1993 U.S. Open. It was her third <a href="US%20Open%20%28tennis%29">US Open</a> title. This was also Suková's fourth and final appearance in a <a href="Grand%20Slam%20%28tennis%29%23Tournaments">major</a> final.
<a href="Monica%20Seles">Monica Seles</a> was the two-time defending champion, but she was unable to participate due to her <a href="Monica_Seles%231993_stabbing_attack">on-court stabbing</a> in April of this year.
Seeds.
The seeded players are listed below. Steffi Graf is the champion; others show the round in which they were eliminated.
